title: VIE008 Data Centre
description: The VIE008 Data Centre in Vienna, Austria, is a modern facility designed for reliability and efficiency. AKRO Solutions delivered full BIM services, focusing on advanced mechanical, public health, and fire protection systems, with robust prefabrication and coordination.

packages.title: Mechanical Package
packages.description: Comfort Cooling / DX Refrigeration / Heating / Ventilation

stage5.additional: Management / Stage 5 Revit / BIM Family Creation / Clash Detection / BWIC layouts
